Text: Been downloading this for over 12 hours now...My ETA just keeps going up on this torrent...3 hours ago it said it would be done in 1 hour...its all the people who just hit and run and do not seed back that make the downloads sooooo slow...Yes having something available to the public is a nice thing, the nice "public people" do not seed back because they are selfish non contributing members of society. May all who hit and run burn a fiery death.
Probably has something to do with your shitty computer/internet connection. Plenty of people are seeding this.  Think before you post.
